title: Agrawas
author: Agrawas
created_time: August 29, 2022, 06:51:20 PMLast edit: August 29, 2022, 09:31:45 PM by Agrawas
content: Up for auction are 3 titanium bill-sized plates from maker SquirrelBits.Each one comes in frame/slab as seen and each piece is loaded with face value except for the 1BTC.All comes with a matching Serial #s 4LOT 1: 2.5k bits / blue Starting Bid: 0.0025BTChttps://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/bc1qsqurrlywrx5uy9j4n5kh664certxzukuv5u8adLOT 2: 5k bits / yellow Starting Bid: 0.005BTChttps://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/bc1qsqurrlyux0h33wn55tqs0xvgq7ag9prsetm983LOT 3: 1million bits / colored Starting Bid: 0.00BTChttps://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1GyWsjTSYUnJWG3nkopogpxhwFjfHQLUuFBottom Note is not loaded and comes with opendime with the associated BTC adderess.PICTURES   High Resolution Pics - https://imgur.com/a/qO1H65mSTARTING BID LOT 1: 0.0025BTCSTARTING BID LOT 2: 0.005BTCSTARTING BID LOT 3: 0.00BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: September 6th, 2022, 19:00:00 EST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time for all LOTSIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to all the lots from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. 3JTQBXCUqjBarYKNG5pqVchZuXzbfkmuJ1SHIPPING: Based on location and preference
